Fri, 10 Jan 2025 23:36:36 +0000 A man fishing off rocks at Piha fell into the water on Thursday afternoon. Photo / Auckland Unlimited
Auckland homicide: Man charged with murder after woman’s body found in Avondale home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-death-in-avondale-auckland/PJGSBRVLORH2LFUBAXMLNCRGME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-death-in-avondale-auckland/PJGSBRVLORH2LFUBAXMLNCRGME/ Residents have been warned to expect a police presence as the scene is examined. Crash near Christchurch kills two and third person taken to hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crash-near-christchurch-kills-two-and-third-person-taken-to-hospital/OR6SQ7FJDBFLROXMFWVLYJ6HOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crash-near-christchurch-kills-two-and-third-person-taken-to-hospital/OR6SQ7FJDBFLROXMFWVLYJ6HOE/ Ben LeahyEmergency teams arrived at the scene just after midnight to find two already dead. Fri, 10 Jan 2025 23:32:10 +0000 Emergency teams are attending a crash near Whanganui, while family and police come to terms with an accident near Christchurch that killed two. Photo / Bevan Conley

Fri, 10 Jan 2025 23:00:00 +0000 A landlord and his tenant have been unable to maintain friendly relations once the lawnmower switches on. Photo/123RF
Health New Zealand to increase security at Middlemore Hospital’s Emergency Department https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-new-zealand-to-increase-security-at-middlemore-hospitals-emergency-department/DGK73VWK2ZF3HACYQJOIAUXIJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-new-zealand-to-increase-security-at-middlemore-hospitals-emergency-department/DGK73VWK2ZF3HACYQJOIAUXIJM/ A patient attempted to strangle an ED nurse at Middlemore Hospital. Fri, 10 Jan 2025 22:22:23 +0000 Health NZ says it will increase security at Middlemore Hospital's Emergency Department.
Seabather’s eruption: ‘Sea lice’ rash plaguing Auckland beachgoershttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/seabathers-eruption-sea-lice-rash-plaguing-auckland-beachgoers/NLWEYY45BZC7VF55NBELOYICRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/seabathers-eruption-sea-lice-rash-plaguing-auckland-beachgoers/NLWEYY45BZC7VF55NBELOYICRA/ Swimmers have reported itching, rashes or red spots after entering the water in Auckland. Fri, 10 Jan 2025 22:20:14 +0000 Auckland beachgoers are reporting symptoms similar to chicken pox due to sea lice in the water at popular bays.
Mongrel Mob boss Mathew Karetu still on run from police before drug, firearms sentencing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-boss-mathew-karetu-still-on-run-from-police-before-drug-firearms-sentencing/IY3OCO6ZUJALTBDN3A3UOK4VSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-boss-mathew-karetu-still-on-run-from-police-before-drug-firearms-sentencing/IY3OCO6ZUJALTBDN3A3UOK4VSA/ Mathew Karetu was busted when police found $68,100 and a gun in a Louis Vuitton handbag. Fri, 10 Jan 2025 22:00:00 +0000 Mongrel Mob boss Mathew Phillip Karetu is on the run after being arrested for dealing methamphetamine across the North Island. Composite Image / NZME
Police investigating after man’s body found in Stoke, Nelson https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-after-mans-body-found-in-stoke-nelson/5JGF66UI5RCNCNCSNAPZKTL2J3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-after-mans-body-found-in-stoke-nelson/5JGF66UI5RCNCNCSNAPZKTL2J3E/ The man's body appeared to have been at an address "for some time", police said. Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:50:48 +0000 The scene examination at the property where the body was found is expected to take several days, police said. File photo / Dean Purcell
Surf lifesaving warning: Swimmers urged to be alert for sharks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/surf-life saving-warning-swimmers-urged-to-be-alert-for-sharks/J5O5K4XF5ZAG7BPSZA4A2D7IBE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/surf-life saving-warning-swimmers-urged-to-be-alert-for-sharks/J5O5K4XF5ZAG7BPSZA4A2D7IBE/ The warning comes after multiple shark sightings on the North Island's east coast. Weather: Summer set to finally arrive for parts of NZ hit by horrible holiday conditions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-summer-set-to-finally-arrive-for-parts-of-nz-hit-by-horrible-holiday-conditions/VEIUNIUBMJFSZOKKVQNQZMQR3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-summer-set-to-finally-arrive-for-parts-of-nz-hit-by-horrible-holiday-conditions/VEIUNIUBMJFSZOKKVQNQZMQR3U/ Ben LeahyNiwa’s outlook for rest of summer picks above-average warmth for the North Island. Photo / Alex Burton
